sentences.sentence: This chemical compound belongs to the group of porphyries and enables plants to build up complicated hydrocarbons from carbon dioxide and the energy of sunlight.
sentences.translation: 这种化合物属卟啉族，它可以使植物从二氧化碳和太阳光能中生成复杂的碳氢化合物。

sentences.sentence: The dark dikes associated with mineralization in the Jinchanggouliang mine area, are mostly fine diorite-quartz diorites and diorite porphyrite-dacite porphyries.
sentences.translation: 金厂沟梁金矿区中与成矿伴生的暗色脉岩主要是细晶闪长岩石英闪长岩、闪长玢岩英安斑岩类。

sentences.sentence: Cu-Mo-Au deposits in Machangqin are typical ores relevant to alkali-rich porphyries of Himalayan movement in"Sanjiang"metallogenic belt, locating at collision environment of Yangtz and Indian plates.
sentences.translation: 马厂箐铜钼金矿床是“三江”成矿带上与喜马拉雅期富碱斑岩有关的典型矿床之一，产于印支板块与扬子板块碰撞构造环境。
